Reviews.Title: “great hospitality and excellent service at this small hotel.”
Reviews.Author: KDJ73
Reviews.Content: stayed days combining business pleasure staff welcoming helped resolve travel issues experience relaxing central quiet location allows access city centre easily stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value (for Amsterdam!) and very nice people”
Reviews.Author: Grumpy1962
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 2527 september 2011 following poor treatment amsterdam hotel comfy clean attic accomodation stayed am fussy happily stay enjoyed hiring bikes hotel cycling vondel park centre city cyclists recomend hotel location

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: LizCheshireUK
Reviews.Content: hotel beautiful location vondelpark meant walking leidesplein beautiful unless raining course previously mentioned little price breakfast cheap 1200 euros wasnt brilliant stroll town breakfast irish pub set day friendly reception staff throughout stay trouble

HotelInfo.Name: King's Villa Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Koningslaan 64, Amsterdam 1075 AG, The Netherlands
